text: BEIJING, Oct 12 General Motors Cos (GM) vehicle sales in China grew 12% over July-September versus the same period a year earlier, the Detroit automakers first Chinese quarterly sales growth in two years.The second-biggest foreign automaker in China by units - after Germanys Volkswagen AG - said on Monday it delivered 771,400 vehicles in China in the third quarter. That followed a second-quarter fall of 5%. (Reporting by Yilei Sun and Brenda Goh; Editing by Jacqueline Wong)
